briefTitle: Trial to Assess Long-term Lacosamide (LCM) Monotherapy Use and Safety of LCM Monotherapy and Adjunctive Therapy for Partial-onset Seizures
officialTitle: A Multicenter, Open-label Extension Trial to Assess the Long-term Use of Lacosamide Monotherapy and Safety of Lacosamide Monotherapy and Adjunctive Therapy in Subjects With Partial-onset Seizures
summary: This open-label extension trial will assess the long-term use of Lacosamide monotherapy and safety of Lacosamide monotherapy and adjunctive therapy in subjects with partial-onset seizures who were previously enrolled in the conversion to monotherapy trial (SP902).

primaryOutcome.measure: Percentage of Subjects on Lacosamide (LCM) Monotherapy at Any Time Between Visit 1 and End of Study
primaryOutcome.timeFrame: From Visit 1 to End of Study (approximately 2 years)
